revised_title: Hairy Crustaceous Substances Voided with Urine: A Case Study and Treatment Recommendations
tldr: A case study is presented about a woman who has been voiding hairy crustaceous substances with her urine for two years. The author, John Powell, shares the details of the woman's condition and seeks advice from Sir Hans Sloane. The case highlights the unusual nature of the substances and the challenges faced by the patient. Sir Hans Sloane provides a detailed response, discussing the possible generation of these substances in the kidneys and suggesting a course of treatment.
